trans-unit.source: Add the jar file or files to the database

seg-source.mrk: Add the jar file or files to the database

target.mrk: Add the jar file or files to the database

trans-unit.source: Use a set of procedures to install, replace, and remove jar files in a database. When you install a jar file in a database, you give it a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> jar name, which is an <codeph>SQL92Identifier</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: Use a set of procedures to install, replace, and remove jar files in a database.
When you install a jar file in a database, you give it a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> jar name, which is an <codeph>SQL92Identifier</codeph>.

target.mrk: Use a set of procedures to install, replace, and remove jar files in a database.
When you install a jar file in a database, you give it a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> jar name, which is an <codeph>SQL92Identifier</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: Once a jar file has been installed, you cannot modify any of the individual classes or resources within the jar file. Instead, you must replace the entire jar file.

seg-source.mrk: Once a jar file has been installed, you cannot modify any of the individual classes or resources within the jar file.
Instead, you must replace the entire jar file.

target.mrk: Once a jar file has been installed, you cannot modify any of the individual classes or resources within the jar file.
Instead, you must replace the entire jar file.
